name: lambci
description: A continuous integration system built on AWS Lambda
author: Michael Hart <michael@soothbooth.com>

scripts.publish: npm run pkg:put && npm run pkg:copy && npm run version:put && npm run template:put
scripts.pkg:put: npm run pkg:zip && aws s3api put-object --bucket lambci --key fn/lambci-build-$(npm run -s v).zip --body lambda.zip --acl public-read
scripts.pkg:copy: aws s3api copy-object --copy-source lambci/fn/lambci-build-$(npm run -s v).zip --bucket lambci --key fn/lambci-build-latest.zip --acl public-read
scripts.version:put: npm run -s v > /tmp/lambci.txt && aws s3api put-object --bucket lambci --key fn/latest.txt --body /tmp/lambci.txt --acl public-read
scripts.template:put: aws s3api put-object --bucket lambci --key templates/lambci.template --body lambci.template --acl public-read
scripts.lambda:update: npm run pkg:zip && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name ${STACK:-lambci}-build --zip-file fileb://lambda.zip
scripts.stack:update: aws cloudformation update-stack --stack-name ${STACK:-lambci} --template-body file://lambci.template --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameters ParameterKey=Version,ParameterValue=$(npm run -s v) ParameterKey=GithubToken,UsePreviousValue=True ParameterKey=Repositories,UsePreviousValue=True ParameterKey=SlackToken,UsePreviousValue=True ParameterKey=SlackChannel,UsePreviousValue=True
